data.name: AboutFormAuthorNote
data.value: Game Launcher © 2012-2013 xdpirate Provat inicialment per Kurithas. Un agraïment especial a la Llisa pel seu suport.
data.comment: The note shown on the about window, copyright and thanks

data.name: AboutFormCloseButtonText
data.comment: Text shown on the button that closes the about window; The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut

data.name: AboutFormContactText
data.comment: Text shown on the link to contact the author

data.name: AboutFormNewVersion1
data.value: Hi ha una nova versió de Game Launcher disponible (v
data.comment: First part of new version available message

data.name: AboutFormNewVersion2
data.comment: Second part of new version available message

data.name: AboutFormUpdateCheckButtonText
data.comment: Text shown on the button that checks for a new update; The ampersand signifes a keyboard shortcut

data.name: AboutFormUpdateError1
data.value: S'ha produït un error tot cercant actualitzacions:
data.comment: Notifies the user that an error occured while checking for update, part 1 of error msg

data.name: AboutFormUpdateError2
data.value: Si us plau intenta-ho de nou més tard o contacta amb l'autor, si el problema persisteix.
data.comment: Asks to try again later if update failed, part 2 of error msg

data.name: AboutFormUpToDate
data.value: La teva instal·lació de Game Launcher està actualitzada!
data.comment: Notifies the user that the application is up to date

data.name: AboutFormWebsiteLinkText
data.comment: Text shown on the link to the application's website

data.name: AddNewGameFormBrowseButtons
data.comment: Common text for all Browse buttons on the form; The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut

data.name: AddNewGameFormBrowseExeHelpText
data.value: Fes clic en aquest botó per seleccionar l'executable utilitzat per iniciar el joc. Sol ser un arxiu amb extensió .exe
data.comment: Help text shown while hovering over the Browse button for Normal Game

data.name: AddNewGameFormCancelButton
data.comment: Flavor text for the button that cancels the game entry; The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut

data.name: AddNewGameFormCancelHelpText
data.value: Fes clic en aquest botó per cancel·lar l'addició d'aquest joc. Si tens més jocs en cua per ser afegits (per exemple, si has fet servir el desplegable o el botó dret de l'explorador), hauràs de cancel·lar-ho tot.
data.comment: Help text shown while hovering over the Cancel button

data.name: AddNewGameFormCmdArgsHelpText
data.value: Introdueixi els paràmetres de la línia de comandes que s'utilitzen per iniciar el joc. Si no saps el que és això, pots deixar-ho en blanc.
data.comment: Help text shown while hovering over the Command-Line Arguments text box

data.name: AddNewGameFormCmdArgsLabel
data.value: Paràmetres de la línia de comandes:
data.comment: Label text for command line arguments

data.name: AddNewGameFormCustomIconHelpText
data.value: Fes clic en aquest botó per seleccionar una icona personalitzada. Ha de ser una imatge BMP, PNG, GIF, JPG o ICO, i serà redimensionada a 16x16. També pots especificar un arxiu EXE d'on extreure la icona principal. La imatge mantindrà la seva relació d'aspecte.
data.comment: Help text shown while hovering over the Browse button for Get From Other File

data.name: AddNewGameFormDefaultHelpText
data.value: Passa el ratolí sobre un element per mostrar l'ajuda en aquest panell.
data.comment: Text shown in the help pane when nothing else is hovered over.

data.name: AddNewGameFormErrorGetFromOtherFileNoIcon
data.value: Has d'especificar una icona si "Obtenir d'un altre fitxer" està seleccionat.
data.comment: Error message when the user didn't choose an icon when 'Get from other file' was also selected

data.name: AddNewGameFormErrorLauncherExeNotFound
data.value: No s'ha trobat el fitxer executable de llançament:
data.comment: Error message when the launcher exe could not be found

data.name: AddNewGameFormErrorMainExeNotFound
data.value: No s'ha trobat el fitxer executable del joc principal:
data.comment: Error message when the main exe could not be found

data.name: AddNewGameFormErrorNoAppId
data.value: Has d'introduir la ID de Steam App per aquest joc.
data.comment: Error message when the user hasn't entered a Steam App ID

data.name: AddNewGameFormErrorNoLauncherPath
data.value: Ha d'especificar una ruta per l'arxiu llançador.
data.comment: Error message when the user hasn't entered a launcher path

data.name: AddNewGameFormErrorNoMainPath
data.value: Has d'especificar una ruta per l'arxiu executable principal.
data.comment: Error message when the user hasn't entered a path

data.name: AddNewGameFormErrorNoName
data.value: Has d'especificar un nom per al joc.
data.comment: Error message when user hasn't entered a name

data.name: AddNewGameFormErrorNoSteamExePath
data.value: Has d'especificar una ruta d'accés a l'executable que Steam fa servir per iniciar el joc.
data.comment: Error message when the user hasn't entered a Steam path

data.name: AddNewGameFormErrorNoSteamExePathClickedGetFromExecutable
data.value: No pots seleccionar la opció "Obtenir des de executable" per la icona sense especificar un arxiu executable per a un joc de Steam.
data.comment: Error message when the user has clicked 'Get from executable' when no Steam executable has been selected

data.name: AddNewGameFormErrorNoSteamIcon
data.value: Has d'especificar una icona per a aquest joc de Steam.
data.comment: Error message when the user didn't choose an icon for a Steam game

data.name: AddNewGameFormErrorSteamExeNotFound
data.value: No s'ha pogut trobar l'executable per al joc de Steam:
data.comment: Error message when the selected exe for a Steam game could not be found

data.name: AddNewGameFormGameInfoGroupBox
data.comment: Flavor text for the group box that contains controls for entering game information

data.name: AddNewGameFormGameNameHelpText
data.value: Introdueix aquí el nom del joc que vols afegir. Pots escriure qualsevol nom, però els signes d'igual (=) es canviaran per guions (-) degut a limitacions tècniques.
data.comment: Help text shown while hovering over the Game Name text box

data.name: AddNewGameFormGameNameLabel
data.comment: Label text for game display name

data.name: AddNewGameFormGamePathsGroupBox
data.value: Ruta del joc/ID de Steam app
data.comment: Flavor text for the group box that contains controls for entering game paths

data.name: AddNewGameFormGetFromExeHelpText
data.value: Selecciona aquesta opció si vols que Game Launcher obtingui la icona del joc de l'executable del joc escollit.
data.comment: Help text shown while hovering over the Get From Exe radio button

data.name: AddNewGameFormGetFromExeRadio
data.comment: Flavor text for the radio button that selects to get the icon from the chosen exe file

data.name: AddNewGameFormGetFromOtherFileHelpText
data.value: Selecciona aquesta opció si vols especificar una icona tu mateix.
data.comment: Help text shown while hovering hover the Get From Other File radio button

data.name: AddNewGameFormGetFromOtherFileRadio
data.comment: Flavor text for the radio button that selects to get the icon from another file

data.name: AddNewGameFormHelpGroupBox
data.comment: Flavor text for the group box that contains the help label

data.name: AddNewGameFormIconGroupBox
data.comment: Flavor text for the group box that contains controls for modifying the game's icon

data.name: AddNewGameFormIconHelpText
data.value: Aquí pots veure una vista prèvia de la icona que es farà servir. Si has indicat que Game Launcher ha de recuperar la icona del executable del joc, hauràs d'especificar l'executable per tal d'actualitzar aquesta previsualització.
data.comment: Help text shown while hovering over the icon preview picturebox

data.name: AddNewGameFormKeepIconRadio
data.comment: Flavor text for the radio button that selects to keep the current icon (if editing a game)

data.name: AddNewGameFormLauncherBrowseHelpText
data.value: Prem aquest botó per seleccionar el llançador utilitzat per llançar l'executable principal del joc.
data.comment: Help text shown while hovering over the Browse button for the launcher

data.name: AddNewGameFormNormalGameHelpText
data.value: Selecciona aquesta opció si es tracta d'un joc normal (és a dir, que no és de Steam).
data.comment: Help text shown while hovering over the Normal Game radio button

data.name: AddNewGameFormNormalGameRadio
data.comment: Flavor text for the radio button that selects the normal game mode (As opposed to Steam game mode)

data.name: AddNewGameFormOKButton
data.comment: Flavor text for the button that finalizes the game entry, the OK-button; The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut

data.name: AddNewGameFormOKHelp
data.value: Fes clic en aquest botó quan hagis acabat d'omplir els detalls del joc que vols afegir.
data.comment: Shown in the Add New Game Form.

data.name: AddNewGameFormSpecifySteamExeCheckBox
data.comment: Flavor text for the check box that selects whether to specify an executable for a Steam game

data.name: AddNewGameFormSpecifySteamExeHelpText
data.value: Marca aquesta casella per seleccionar l'executable que Steam utilitzarà per executar el joc. Activant-la permetràs el seguiment de temps de joc per als jocs de Steam. Si el joc fa servir un llançador, no cap que marquis la casella, només ha de seleccionar l'executable principal del joc.
data.comment: Help text shown while hovering over the Specify Steam Exe checkbox

data.name: AddNewGameFormSteamAppIdHelpText
data.value: Introdueix aquí la ID de Steam App. Per trobar la ID, busca el joc a la botiga de Steam i copia la identificació de l'última part de la URL (per exemple a http://store.steampowered.com/app/24980/ -> la ID és 24980)
data.comment: Help text shown while hovering over the Steam App Id text box

data.name: AddNewGameFormSteamExeBrowseHelpText
data.value: Fes clic aquí per buscar l'executable principal que Steam utilitzarà per executar el joc.
data.comment: Help text shown while hovering over the Browse for Steam Exe button

data.name: AddNewGameFormSteamGameRadio
data.comment: Flavor text for the radio button that selects the Steam game mode (As opposed to the normal game mode)

data.name: AddNewGameFormSteamHelpText
data.value: Selecciona aquesta opció si aquest és un joc que ha de ser iniciat a través de Steam.
data.comment: Help text shown while hovering over the Steam Game radio

data.name: AddNewGameFormTitleBar
data.comment: The text shown in the title bar of the Add/Edit game window

data.name: AddNewGameFormUsesLauncherCheckBox
data.comment: Flavor text for the check box that selects whether the game uses a launcher exe

data.name: AddNewGameFormUsesLauncherHelpText
data.value: Marca aquesta casella si el joc que vols afegir utilitza un llançador. Un llançador és un executable que iniciarà el joc principal. Activant-la permetrà el seguiment de temps de joc per als jocs que requereixen fer servir un llançador.
data.comment: Help text shown while hovering over the Uses Launcher check box

data.name: DockOpacityFormHoverOpacityGroupBox
data.value: Opacitat de la barra quan tingui en focus (el ratolí passa per sobre la barra)
data.comment: Flavor text shown in the group box that contains controls to change the opacity when in focus

data.name: DockOpacityFormNormalOpacityGroupBox
data.value: Opacitat de la barra quan no tingui en focus
data.comment: Flavor text shown in the group box that contains controls to change the opacity when not in focus

data.name: DockOpacityFormSaveButton
data.comment: Text shown on the 'Save' button; The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut

data.name: DockOpacityFormTitleBar
data.comment: The text shown in the title bar of the Dock Opacity window

data.name: DragDropTargetFormTitleBar
data.value: Deixa anar un accés directe o executable aquí!
data.comment: Text shown in the drag-and-drop window's title bar

data.name: EmbeddableChartFormCopiedToClipBoardText
data.comment: Text shown in the message box when a user clicks the copy to clipboard button

data.name: EmbeddableChartFormCopyButton
data.comment: Text shown on the Copy button; The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut

data.name: EmbeddableChartFormCourtesyLabel
data.comment: Text shown on the courtesy label; is.gd is a website

data.name: EmbeddableChartFormFlavorTextLabel
data.value: Mot bé! Envia l'enllaç de sota als teus amics i estimats:
data.comment: Text shown in the label of the linkable chart window

data.name: EmbeddableChartFormGTFOButton
data.comment: Text shown on the Close button; The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut

data.name: EmbeddableChartFormTitleBar
data.comment: Text shown in the title bar of the linkable chart window

data.name: EmbeddableChartFormVisitLinkButton
data.comment: Text shown on the Visit Link button; The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut

data.name: GLOptionsFormAutoUpdateCheckBox
data.value: Comprovar automàticament si hi ha actualitzacions
data.comment: Text shown on the 'Automatically check for updates' check box

data.name: GLOptionsFormExplorerIntegrationText
data.comment: This text appears in Windows Explorer, when having right-clicked a supported file; The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut

data.name: GLOptionsFormGTFOButton
data.comment: Text shown on the Close button; The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut

data.name: GLOptionsFormInfoLabel
data.comment: Text shown on the Preferences form

data.name: GLOptionsFormIntegrateWithExplorerCheckBox
data.comment: Text shown on the 'Integrate with Windows Explorer' check box

data.name: GLOptionsFormPlayTimeInSkypeNotificationsCheckBox
data.value: Mostrar el temps dedicat al sortir del joc
data.comment: Text shown on the 'Show time spent playing when exiting game' check box

data.name: GLOptionsFormPreferencesGroupBox
data.comment: Flavor text shown in the group box that houses the preferences, in the Preferences window

data.name: GLOptionsFormSkypeNotificationsCheckBox
data.value: Enviar notificacions per Skype quan comencis o acabis de jugar
data.comment: Text shown on the 'Send notifications to Skype when you start/stop playing' check box

data.name: GLOptionsFormStartOnLoginCheckBox
data.value: Iniciar Game Launcher quan iniciïs sessió
data.comment: Text shown on the 'Start Game Launcher on startup' check box

data.name: GLOptionsFormTitleBar
data.comment: This text appears in the title bar of the Preferences window

data.name: MainFormAddGameFailed1
data.value: Alguna cosa ha fallat! . NET Framework diu:
data.comment: First part of text shown when something went wrong adding a game

data.name: MainFormAddGameFailed2
data.value: Si creus que això és un error, o el missatge d'error persisteix, posa't en contacte amb l'autor.
data.comment: Second part of text shown when something went wrong adding a game

data.name: MainFormBalloonTipLoadedMessageText
data.value: Prem botó dret en aquesta icona o prem Windows+G per obrir la llista
data.comment: Text appears in the balloon tip body when starting the application.

data.name: MainFormBalloonTipLoadedMessageTitle
data.comment: Text appears in the balloon tip title when starting the application. {0} is the current version number.

data.name: MainFormClearGameList
data.value: Estàs segur de voler suprimir tots els elements de la llista? Aquesta acció NO es pot desfer!
data.comment: Appears when the user chooses to clear all games.

data.name: MainFormEditGameItem
data.comment: Shown in the main menu under every game. The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut.

data.name: MainFormEditGameItemTooltip
data.comment: The tooltip shown when hovering over the 'Edit game' menu item.

data.name: MainFormLoadingMessage
data.value: Game Launcher està carregant, si us plau espera...
data.comment: Text shown when hovering over the tray icon whilst the application is loading

data.name: MainFormNewVersionAvailable1
data.value: Hi ha una nova versió de Game Launcher disponible (v {0})! Vols descarregar-la ara?
data.comment: Text appears when auto-checking for updates, and an update was found. {0} is the new version number.

data.name: MainFormNewVersionAvailable2
data.value: Si decideixes no actualitzar ara, la comprovació de noves versions es desactivarà fins la propera sessió.
data.comment: Text appears when auto-checking for updates.

data.name: MainFormOptionsItem
data.comment: Shown in the main menu. The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut.

data.name: MainFormQuitApplication
data.value: Segur que vols sortir de Game Launcher?
data.comment: Appears when user chooses the 'Quit' menu item.

data.name: MainFormQuitItem
data.comment: Shown in the main menu. The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut.

data.name: MainFormRemoveCmdArgs
data.value: Estas segur de voler suprimir tots els paràmetres de línia de comandes per {0}?
data.comment: Text shown when user clears command-line arguments. {0} is the name of the game chosen.

data.name: MainFormRemoveGameItem
data.comment: Shown in the main menu under every game. The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut.

data.name: MainFormRemoveGameItemTooltip
data.value: Esborrar aquest joc de la llista
data.comment: The tooltip shown when hovering over the 'Remove game' menu item.

data.name: MainFormRemoveGameMsg
data.value: Segur que vols esborrar {0} de la llista?
data.comment: Shown when trying to remove a game. {0} is the name of the chosen game.

data.name: MainFormSelectIconText
data.comment: {0} is the name of the game the user is selecting the icon for.

data.name: MainFormSkypeNowPlaying
data.comment: Shown in Skype when the user starts a non-Steam game.

data.name: MainFormSkypeNowPlayingSteam
data.comment: Shown in Skype when user starts a Steam game

data.name: MainFormSkypePlayStopped
data.comment: Appears in Skype when finished playing a game. {0} is the name of the game.

data.name: MainFormSkypePlayTimeStopped
data.comment: Appears in Skype when finished playing a game and the user has chosen to display playing time. {0} is the amount of time played.

data.name: MainFormTimeHourPlural
data.comment: Plural form of 'hour'

data.name: MainFormTimeHourSingular
data.comment: Singular form of 'hour'

data.name: MainFormTimeMinutePlural
data.comment: Plural form of 'minute'

data.name: MainFormTimeMinuteSingular
data.comment: Singular form of 'minute'

data.name: MainFormTimeSecondPlural
data.comment: Plural form of 'seconds'

data.name: MainFormTimeSecondSingular
data.comment: Singular form of 'second'

data.name: MainMenuAboutTooltip
data.value: Mostrar informació sobre l'aplicació i els seus col·laboradors.
data.comment: Tooltip for a main menu item.

data.name: MainMenuAddGameTooltip
data.value: Afegeix un joc a la llista. També pots fer doble clic a la barra de icones per afegir jocs ràpidament arrossegant i deixant anar els accessos directes o executables allà.
data.comment: Tooltip for a main menu item.

data.name: MainMenuClearGameListTooltip
data.value: Esborra tots els articles de la llista de jocs. Aquesta acció no es pot desfer!
data.comment: Tooltip for a main menu item.

data.comment: Shown in the main menu. The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut.

data.comment: Shown in the main menu. The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut.

data.name: MainMenuRemoveGamesTooltip
data.value: Esborrar un o més jocs de la llista.
data.comment: Tooltip for a main menu item.

data.comment: Shown on the Pie Chart form

data.comment: Shown on the button that closes the form. The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut.

data.name: PieChartFormGenerateChartButton
data.comment: Shown on the Generate Chart button. The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut

data.comment: Shown in the label picker box

data.name: PieChartFormLabelPickerNone
data.comment: Shown in the label picker box

data.name: PieChartFormLabelPickerOutside
data.comment: Shown in the label picker box

data.name: PieChartFormNoData
data.value: Vaja! Sembla que no hi ha cap dada gravada. Juga a algun joc i torna després!
data.comment: Shown when there is no data for the form to display.

data.name: PieChartFormPleaseWait
data.comment: Shown when generating a linkable chart

data.name: PieChartFormSaveAsImageButton
data.comment: Shown on the Save As Image button. The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut

data.name: PieChartFormSaveAsImageSuccess
data.comment: Success message when user saves chart as image

data.name: PieChartFormSaveAsImageTitleBar
data.comment: Text shown in the title bar for the file browser when user selected to save the chart as an image.

data.name: PieChartFormShowLegendCheckBox
data.comment: Shown on the Show Legend checkbox, it toggles the color key/explanation on the right side

data.comment: The one-character shorthand for "hours"

data.comment: The one-character shorthand for "minutes"

data.comment: Shown on the Cancel button. The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut.

data.name: RemoveFormConfirmRemoval
data.value: Esteu segur de voler esborrar els elements seleccionats?
data.comment: Shows when the user tries to remove items

data.name: RemoveFormFlavorTextLabel
data.value: Si us plau, selecciona els elements que vols eliminar. Prem la tecla CTRL per seleccionar més d'un element a la vegada.
data.comment: Shown in the Remove window

data.name: RemoveFormNoItemsSelected
data.comment: Shown in the remove window when the user tries to remove items without having selected any.

data.comment: Shown on the Remove Item(s) button. The ampersand signifies a keyboard shortcut.

data.name: RemoveFormTitleBar
data.comment: Shown in the title bar of the Remove window
